LanguageData.SK.XCN.Neutroamine.label: Neutroamine
LanguageData.SK.XCN.Neutroamine.description: The amount of neutroamine required to assemble this xenogerm. Higher complexity xenogerms require more neutroamine for stabilization during the assembly process.
LanguageData.SK.XCN.ModSettingsHardmodeTooltip: Neutroamine cost will now have a multiplier for archite genes
